mapper.select: SELECT rt.id AS id, rt.name AS name, rt.game AS game, rt.creation_date AS creation_date, rt.gm_id AS gm_id, rc.id AS rc_id, rc.name AS rc_name, rc.table_id AS rc_table_id, rc.player_id AS rc_player_id, rc.data AS rc_data, rc.creation_date AS rc_creation_date FROM rpg_table rt LEFT JOIN rpg_character rc ON rc.table_id=rt.id WHERE rt.gm_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rt.creation_date DESC

SELECT rt.id AS id, rt.name AS name, rt.game AS game, rt.creation_date AS creation_date, rt.gm_id AS gm_id, rc.id AS rc_id, rc.name AS rc_name, rc.table_id AS rc_table_id, rc.player_id AS rc_player_id, rc.data AS rc_data, rc.creation_date AS rc_creation_date FROM rpg_table rt LEFT JOIN rpg_character rc ON rc.table_id=rt.id WHERE rt.id = #{tableId} AND rt.gm_id = #{userId} ORDER BY rt.creation_date DESC
SELECT rt.id AS id, rt.name AS name, rt.game AS game, rt.creation_date AS creation_date, rt.gm_id AS gm_id FROM rpg_table rt WHERE rt.id = #{tableId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rpg_table (name, game, creation_date, gm_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{game}, #{creationDate}, #{gmId})
